io.pivotal.rti.protocols

Annotation Type TextProtocol


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Inherited
@Documented
public @interface TextProtocol
    In order to implement a text based protocol adapter, the ProtocolAdapter must be annotated with TextProtocol. This is necessary because the Ingester server will then switch over to a line based channel instead of the frame based channels used for binary protocols (which is the default).
